author: BionicleBOOM
title: Wow, first to review, and I've had this thing a month too!
review: This is another Creator vehicle, and goes well alongside the Garbage Truck.  The set has a very good look to it, very nice.  The hook arm or whatever you call that thing on the back goes up and down.  Altogether nice set, and I hope the rest of the Brickmaster sets are like this one.
